name: The Imaginary World Of Richard Capnell
name_original: The Imaginary World Of Richard Capnell
description:
This is the story of a blind kid whose father describes the world in a non realistic way making his soon image a very different world.

On this game you play as Richard, a blind kid that used to love to play piano, he uses the sound reverberation of a cane to reveal walls and obstacles on his path.
